homePage.GooseTrack: GooseTracks Calendar view provides a comprehensive overview of your schedule, displaying all your tasks, events, and appointments in a visually appealing and intuitive layout.
homePage.GooseTrack offers: GooseTrack offers easy access to your account settings, calendar, and filters. The 'My Account' section allows you to manage your profile information and preferences, while the calendar provides a quick and convenient way to view your upcoming events and tasks.
homePage.GooseTrack is: GooseTrack is an all-in-one productivity tool that helps you stay on top of your tasks, events, and deadlines. Say goodbye to scattered to-do lists and hello to streamlined productivity with GooseTrack.

notifications.Time Error: End time should be bigger than start time
notifications.Incorrect: Password or email is incorrect. Please check
notifications.Verify: Email is not verified yet. Check email box for verification
notifications.User not found: User is not found. Please check email
notifications.New password: New password was sent to email. Please check
notifications.Not found: User with this email not found
notifications.Went wrong: Something is wrong. Try a later
notifications.Approve: Check your email and approve registration
notifications.Already exists: User with this email already exists. Please log in
notifications.More characters: review must have more than 6 characters
notifications.Congratulations: Congratulations. Your request has been sent
notifications.Password is not the same: Password is not the same, please re-enter
notifications.Password changed: Password has been successfully changed and sent to user email
